name: ZipZip (itch)
description:
ZipZip:

Zipzip is my first officially released project.i started developing games a few years ago but i dont release them(i show them to my friends only).so i am sure i have a lot of mistakes.please let me know them.i would really appreciate it.Thanks

My goal is to publish my games on google play store.

Make sure to check out my  patreon page

Notes:

I will make more levels in the future.
